metadata.title: CVE-2024-57905 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: adc: ti-ads1119: fix information leak in triggered bufferThe 'scan' local struct is used to push data to user space from atriggered buffer, but it has a hole between the sample (unsigned int)and the timestamp. This hole is never initialized.Initialize the struct to zero before using it to avoid pushinguninitialized information to userspace.
